title: What are new Jio Fiber plans announced in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Described below are the JioFiber plans offered by Reliance Jio to its customers: JioFiber Bronze Broadband Plan The Bronze broadband plan offered by Jio is priced at Rs 399 per month. Under this plan, users get unlimited data at speeds of 30Mbps. In addition to this, free unlimited voice calls within India. JioFiber Silver Broadband Plan JioFiber Silver broadband plan is available at Rs 699 per month. The plan offers unlimited data at speed of up to 100Mbps and unlimited voice calling benefits. JioFiber Gold Broadband Plan Users can enjoy unlimited internet at speed of up to 150 Mbps under the Gold broadband plan priced at Rs 999 per month. Customers also get unlimited voice calling benefits and complimentary subscription to 11 OTT apps. JioFiber Diamond Broadband Plan Priced at Rs 1499, the JioFiber Diamond plan offers customers unlimited data with speeds of up to 300Mbps. Subscribers also get unlimited calling benefits and complimentary access to 12 OTT apps. JioFiber Diamond+ Broadband Plan Subscribe to the Diamond+ broadband plan get 500Mbps speed for up to 4,000GB data. Priced at Rs 2499, the plan offers unlimited calling benefits and subscription to 12 OTT apps. JioFiber Platinum Broadband Plan JioFiber Platinum plan offers customers up to 7,500GB of data at up to 1Gbps speed. Under this plan, users get unlimited voice calls and complimentary subscription to 12 OTT apps. The plan is priced at Rs 3,999 per month. JioFiber Titanium Broadband Plan Users can subscribe to JioFiber Titanium plan at Rs 8,499 per month. The benefits are similar to that in Platinum plan. The only difference is of data FUP. Customers get 15000GB of monthly data at speeds of up to 1Gbps. Here are certain terms and conditions for users about these plans: Once the recharge is done, no refund would be made nor the amount will be transferred to any other accountVoice calls are totally free of cost until and unless they are made to premium numbers or outside IndiaTariff includes Goods and Services Tax (GST)One month means 30 daysCommercial use policy of 3300 GB applicable on all Truly Unlimited Plans
